title: Hubert Jocham
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210609/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210609/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Hubert Jocham**

Jocham began his type design career with several releases for [Elsner+Flake](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210609/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Elsner%2BFlake), but is now more well known for his custom typefaces for mainstream magazines, such as _Details_.

**External Links**  
 [Personal Site](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210609/http:/hubertjocham.de/)  
 [Hubert Jocham at FontShop](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204210609/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?did=433)
author: Stephen Coles
